en.title: Cat Food Allergies: How to Identify Symptoms and What to Do
en.content:
Cats can have food allergies too, which may manifest as skin itching or digestive symptoms.

Common Symptoms

Typical symptoms include itching and redness around the face, ears, and neck, recurring vomiting or diarrhea, and hair loss. Since it can be difficult to distinguish from environmental allergies (house dust, pollen, etc.), a veterinary diagnosis is necessary.

Common Allergen Ingredients

Beef, dairy products, fish, chicken, and wheat are among the most common food allergens for cats. However, individual sensitivities vary greatly.

Diagnosis and Treatment

Diagnosis is made through an elimination diet trial, where a novel protein or hydrolyzed protein food is fed for 8-12 weeks. If improvement is seen, the original food is gradually reintroduced to identify the specific allergen.

zh.title: 猫咪食物过敏：如何识别症状及应对方法
zh.content:
猫咪也会有食物过敏，表现为皮肤瘙痒或消化系统症状。

主要症状

脸部、耳朵、颈部周围的瘙痒和发红，反复呕吐或腹泻，脱毛等是典型症状。由于很难与环境过敏（粉尘、花粉等）区分，需要兽医进行诊断。

容易引起过敏的食材

牛肉、乳制品、鱼类、鸡肉、小麦等被认为是容易引起过敏的食材。不过个体差异较大。

诊断与应对

通过排除饮食试验进行诊断（喂食新型蛋白质或水解蛋白质食品8-12周）。如果症状改善，再逐步恢复原来的食物以确定过敏原。
